games.title: Monster Survivors - Roguelike Action
games.description: Survive endless waves of monsters in this action-packed roguelike survival game! Choose from multiple characters, each with unique abilities and starting weapons. Level up your character, evolve weapons, and face increasingly difficult boss battles. Inspired by Vampire Survivors, this game combines fast-paced action with strategic character building. How long can you survive as the monsters get stronger?
games.shortDesc: Survive endless monster waves in this roguelike action game
games.controls: 使用WASD或方向键移动角色，自动攻击怪物，升级时选择武器和技能
games.tips: 选择合适的武器组合，优先升级血量和移动速度，注意boss出现时间

games.title: 2048 Game - Number Puzzle
games.description: Play the addictive 2048 number puzzle game online for free! Combine tiles with the same numbers to reach 2048. This classic math puzzle game challenges your strategic thinking and planning skills. Swipe to move tiles and combine identical numbers to create larger ones. Can you reach the elusive 2048 tile?
games.shortDesc: Combine numbers to reach 2048 in this addictive puzzle game
games.controls: 使用方向键或滑动屏幕来移动数字方块
games.tips: 规划移动路线，保持最大数字在角落，避免随意移动造成死局

games.title: Bubble Shooter Classic Free
games.description: Aim and shoot colorful bubbles in this addictive classic game! Match 3 or more bubbles of the same color to make them pop and clear the board. Use strategy to create chain reactions and earn bonus points. Features over 100 challenging levels with increasing difficulty and special power-ups.
games.shortDesc: Aim and match colorful bubbles in this classic arcade game
games.controls: 鼠标瞄准并点击发射泡泡，匹配3个或更多相同颜色
games.tips: 瞄准准确，利用反弹角度，优先消除上层泡泡制造连锁反应

games.title: Endless Runner Games 3D
games.description: Run as far as you can in this exciting endless runner game! Jump over obstacles, collect coins, and power-ups while running through colorful 3D environments. Features smooth gameplay, multiple characters to unlock, and weekly leaderboard challenges. Perfect for quick gaming sessions!
games.shortDesc: Run endlessly through 3D environments, avoiding obstacles and collecting coins
games.controls: 左右键转向，上键跳跃，下键滑铲，空格键使用道具
games.tips: 提前预判障碍物，收集金币购买角色和道具，保持节奏感

games.title: Car Racing Games Unblocked
games.description: Race high-speed cars on various tracks around the world! Features realistic physics, multiple car classes, and competitive AI opponents. Customize your vehicles with upgrades and paint jobs. Master different racing disciplines from street racing to formula competitions.
games.shortDesc: Race high-speed cars on tracks worldwide with realistic physics
games.controls: 方向键或WASD控制赛车，空格键手刹，Shift键氮气加速
games.tips: 掌握过弯技巧，合理使用氮气加速，熟悉赛道布局抢占先机

games.title: Racing Games Split Screen
games.description: Race against your friend in split-screen multiplayer racing! Choose from various high-performance cars and compete on exciting tracks. Features local 2-player mode, multiple racing disciplines, and car customization options. Perfect for competitive racing with friends.
games.shortDesc: Split-screen racing competition with friends and fast cars
games.controls: 玩家1: WASD控制，玩家2: 方向键控制，空格键刹车
games.tips: 熟悉赛道弯道，合理使用漂移过弯，卡位阻挡对手超车

games.title: 2048 Classic - Self Hosted
games.description: Play the original 2048 number puzzle game! Combine tiles with the same numbers to reach the 2048 tile. This is the classic self-hosted version with clean interface and smooth animations. Join numbers strategically to reach the highest score possible.
games.shortDesc: Original 2048 game with clean interface and smooth gameplay
games.controls: 使用方向键移动数字方块，合并相同数字
games.tips: 保持最大数字在角落，规划每次移动，避免填满整个棋盘

games.title: Snake Game Classic - Self Hosted
games.description: Play the classic Snake game! Control the snake to eat food and grow longer while avoiding walls and your own tail. Features smooth gameplay, score tracking, and classic retro styling. How long can you make your snake?
games.shortDesc: Classic snake game with food collection and growth mechanics
games.controls: 方向键控制蛇的移动方向，吃食物增长身体
games.tips: 避免撞墙和撞到自己的身体，规划移动路线收集食物

games.title: Tic Tac Toe - Self Hosted
games.description: Play the classic Tic Tac Toe game! Two players take turns marking spaces in a 3x3 grid. The first player to get three marks in a row (horizontal, vertical, or diagonal) wins. Features score tracking and clean modern design.
games.shortDesc: Classic Tic Tac Toe game with score tracking and modern design
games.controls: 点击格子放置X或O标记，也可用键盘1-9键选择位置
games.tips: 占据中心位置很重要，阻挡对手连线同时创造自己的获胜机会

note: Updated version with 6 verified external games + 3 self-hosted games
